snippet.title: LinkedIn's Top Stories: Han Solo vs. Vito Corleone -- Who is the Better Leader?
snippet.description:
* Daniel Roth
LinkedIn's Top Stories: Han Solo vs. Vito Corleone -- Who is the Better Leader? Daniel Roth April 6, 2012
Here’s an idea for a new game: Would You Rather, The Business Edition. Here goes: Would you rather work for Han Solo or Don Vito Corleone? Pros and cons of Han: Goes out of his way to help you when you’re stuck (in a cave with a hungry wampa, for example), but also a selfish boss who shoots first (you’re fired). On the Corleone front: Your manager has so much respect that every project you work on gets plenty of resources and support. On the other hand: You quake…
* Topics: * LinkedIn News
